DOC.detailed_description: In two-year time period ( 2011 2012 ) 443 patient suspect disc herniation risk low work ability - base questionnaire participate randomize control trial . The patient randomize either intervention group ( n=220 ) control group ( n=223 ) . The intervention group invite Department Social Medicine two four week first contact Department Rheumatology consultation physician specialize social medicine . Together patient return-to-work ( RTW ) schedule make ascertain need contact workplace ( adjust work function ) , municipality , general practitioner short-term supportive consultation psychologist . Throughout intervention , patient receive usual treatment Department Rheumatology like patient control group . Outcome return work force one year follow use information national registry .
